attributes.action: Licence Public Firework Displays and Ban All Private Sales and Purchases
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In order to hold a firework display it should only be allowed at an organised public venue with fully licensed health and safety staff present within allocated hours.  Private sales to youths and homeowners should not be permitted for the safety of property and lives.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
